Regulation Name(s): Device to detect and measure non-microbial analyte(s) in human clinical specimens to aid in assessment of patients with suspected sepsis
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VIDAS B.R.A.H.M.S. PCT automated immunoassay for procalcitonin measurement in serum or plasma to aid sepsis and infection management
Indications for Use Summary: Aids risk assessment for ICU patients progressing to severe sepsis/septic shock, assesses 28-day all-cause mortality risk, supports antibiotic therapy decisions for lower respiratory tract infection, and aids antibiotic discontinuation for suspected/confirmed sepsis
